method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the fields to their default value.

field.name: IsInitialized
field.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

class.name: b4j.starchild.starchild_b4j_smartgraphview
class.event: MouseMoving(X As Double, Y As Double) 'Hovering over graph
MouseClicked(X As Double, Y As Double) 'Clicked on the graph
class.designerProperty: Key: AXIS_INDENT, DisplayName: Axis Indent, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 50,MinRange: 10, MaxRange: 100, Description: The distance from the border to the graph axis.
Key: AXIS_COLOUR, DisplayName: Axis Line Colour, FieldType: Color, DefaultValue: #FF000000, Description: Colour of the X and Y axis.
Key: AXIS_LINE_WIDTH, DisplayName: Axis Line Width, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 2,MinRange: 0, MaxRange: 10, Description: The Width of the X and Y axis lines.
Key: AXIS_MARKER_LENGTH, DisplayName: Axis Interval Mark, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 4,MinRange: 0, MaxRange: 10, Description: The Length of the axis interval marks.
Key: AXIS_TEXT_SIZE, DisplayName: Axis Text Size, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 15,MinRange: 0, MaxRange: 50, Description: Text Size of the axis scales.
Key: AXIS_X_TEXT_COLOUR, DisplayName: Axis Text Colour, FieldType: Color, DefaultValue: 0xFF008000, Description: Text colour for the X axis scale.
Key: AXIS_Y_TEXT_COLOUR, DisplayName: Axis Text Colour, FieldType: Color, DefaultValue: #FFFF0000, Description: Text colour for the Y axis scale.
Key: GRID_COLOUR, DisplayName: Grid Colour, FieldType: Color, DefaultValue: #FFA9A9A9, Description: Colour of the X/Y grid.
Key: SHOW_GRID, DisplayName: Show Grid, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Display the X/Y grid.
Key: TITLE_TEXT, DisplayName: Title Text, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: My Graph, Description: The title is displayed above the graph inside the top indent.
Key: TITLE_SIZE, DisplayName: Title Size, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 20,MinRange: 0, MaxRange: 50, Description: Text Size of the graph title.
Key: TITLE_COLOUR, DisplayName: Title Colour, FieldType: Color, DefaultValue: #FF0000FF, Description: Colour of the graph title text.
Key: MARKER_TEXT, DisplayName: Marker Label Text, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Text value of the Label that appears next to the Marker.
Key: MARKER_TEXT_SIZE, DisplayName: Marker Text Size, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 15,MinRange: 0, MaxRange: 50, Description: Text Size of the Marker label text.
Key: SHOW_MARKER, DisplayName: Show Marker, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Show the selection marker when moving over the graph.
Key: MARKER_WIDTH, DisplayName: Marker Width, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 3,MinRange: 0, MaxRange: 10, Description: Width of the graph selection marker.
Key: MARKER_COLOUR, DisplayName: Marker Colour, FieldType: Color, DefaultValue: #FFFFFF00, Description: Colour of the graph selection marker.
Key: UseDropShadow, DisplayName: Drop Shadow, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Applies a soft drop shadow behind the graph.
Key: SHOW_DATA_LINE, DisplayName: Show Data Line, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Draw a line connecting the data points on the graph.
Key: DATA_LINE_COLOUR, DisplayName: Data Line Colour, FieldType: Color, DefaultValue: #FFFF00FF, Description: Colour of the data line drawn on the graph.
Key: DATA_LINE_WIDTH, DisplayName: Data Line Width, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 2,MinRange: 1, MaxRange: 10, Description: Width of the data line drawn on the graph.
Key: SHOW_DATA_BAR, DisplayName: Show Data Bar, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Draw a vertical bar for each data point on the graph.
Key: DATA_BAR_COLOUR, DisplayName: Data Bar Colour, FieldType: Color, DefaultValue: #FFFF8000, Description: Colour of the data bars drawn on the graph.

Key: DATA_BAR_WIDTH, DisplayName: Data Bar Width, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 30,MinRange: 0, MaxRange: 500, Description: Width of the data bars drawn on the graph. NB: If Width=0 it will automatically adjust data bar widths.
Key: SHOW_DATA_POINT, DisplayName: Show Data Point, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Draw a DOT at each data point on the graph.
Key: DATA_POINT_COLOUR, DisplayName: Data Point Colour, FieldType: Color, DefaultValue: #FF000080, Description: Colour of the data points drawn on the graph.

Key: DATA_POINT_SIZE, DisplayName: Data Point Size, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 10,MinRange: 0, MaxRange: 100, Description: Radius of the data points drawn on the graph. NB: If Size=0 it will automatically adjust data point size.

Key: OVERLAY_TEXT, DisplayName: Overlay Text, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: This text is overlayed on top of the graph. Can be used as a Water-Mark when the OVERLAY_COLOUR has a reduced ALPHA level.

Key: OVERLAY_SIZE, DisplayName: Overlay Size, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 20,MinRange: 0, MaxRange: 50, Description: Text Size of the overlayed text. NB: This size is auto adjusted based on graph width.
Key: OVERLAY_COLOUR, DisplayName: Overlay Colour, FieldType: Color, DefaultValue: #70000000, Description: Colour of the overlayed text. Best with a reduced ALPHA level.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _adjustrightedge
method.comment: Adjust the indent at the right edge of the graph. NB: This value is multiplied by the AXIS_INDENT value to determine the actual right indent. Edge = 1.0 ... which would give a right indent of AXIS_INDENT The default value is (0.7)

method.name: _autorescale
method.comment:
Adjust Graph Minimums and Maximums to fit all Plotted data NB: Should call SortAllDataX() first.
If existing Scales do not extend far enough, then for Mode=TRUE ... Increase NumberOfSteps, (StepValue remains the same) Mode=FALSE .. Increase StepValue, (NumberOfSteps remains the same)

method.name: _clear
method.comment: Clear the Graph and erase ALL plotted data

method.name: _gettimeformatx
method.comment: Returns: TimeFormat used for X axis

method.name: _plot
method.comment:
Add this data element to the graph
NB: Will NOT appear on graph until RenderAllNow() is called.

method.name: _renderallnow
method.comment: Redraw the Graph entirely. The grid, both X/Y axis, the plotted data, the title and overlay.

method.name: _rendertitleonly
method.comment: Much faster to only re-draw the Title text.

method.name: _setaxisx
method.comment:
Define the X axis for the graph.
The X axis can show time-of-day using TICK values. Use the TimeFormat paramter to show the TOD on the X axis. "h:mma" eg. 4:32pm "hh:mma" eg. 04:32pm "HH:mm" eg. 16:32 "HH" eg. 16 "HH:mm:ss" eg. 16:32:41
NB: The parameters, NumberOfSteps and/or StepValue can be (0) to automatically calculate Y axis.

method.name: _setaxisy
method.comment:
Define the Y axis for the graph.
NB: The parameters, NumberOfSteps and/or StepValue can be (0) to automatically calculate Y axis.

method.name: _snapshot
method.comment: Returns: Image of the entire Graph (including Marker)

method.name: _snapshot2
method.comment: Returns: Image of the entire Graph (without Marker)

method.name: _sortalldatax
method.comment: Sort All Plotted Data into Ascending order on the X axis.

method.name: _testgraph
method.comment: Display a Graph to demonstrate features.
